title: Hospitalization determinants in patients with Mpox disease: The CEME-22 Project
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): G. Ramírez Olivencia, M.M. Vera García, M. Velasco Arribas, J. Casabona, M.J. Martínez, F.J. Membrillo De Novales, on behalf of the CEME-22 Study Group. Study Group team members are listed in the Acknowledgments
